ComicInfo.Penciller: Carlo Barberi,Matt Larson,Rich Hedden,Matt Larson,Carlo Barberi,Rich Hedden
ComicInfo.Summary: Three tales that run the gamut from superhero action to lighthearted adventure. First up, as a lead-in to his appearance in Ghost this month, Comics' Greatest World's Vortex battles monsters of his own making in a story by Mike Kennedy and Matt Larson. Also, introducing Philip Amara and Carlo Barberi's "Burglar Girls," three students attending a very peculiar academy for would-be thieves; and the spacefaring, robot-battling "Galactic Jack," the latest creation from Roachmill's Rich Hedden.
ComicInfo.Tags: United States Army,Vortex (Dark Horse),Lieutenant Eileen Anderson,The Seekers
ComicInfo.Title: Transformations; First Day, Wild Night; One Night Stand-Off
ComicInfo.Writer: Mike Kennedy,Philip D. Amara,Rich Hedden,Phil Amara,Mike Kennedy,Phil Amara,Rich Hedden
